mapper.select: select d.dept_no, d.dept_name, count(emp_no) as emp_count from dept d left outer join com c on d.COM_ID =c.COM_ID left outer join emp e on d.DEPT_NO = e.DEPT_NO where c.com_id = #{comId} group by d.dept_no, d.dept_name order by dept_name
mapper.update: update dept set dept_name = #{deptDto.deptName} where dept_no=#{deptNo}
